topic.title: Formatting and Indenting CSS Stylesheets (Pretty Print)

keywords.indexterm: Editing CSS Stylesheetsformat and indent (pretty print)

body.p: If the edited CSS stylesheet becomes unreadable because of the bad alignment of the text lines, the pretty-print operation available for XML documents is also available for CSS stylesheets. It works in the same way as for XML documents and is available as the same menu and toolbar action.
